mods.abstract: Loose Photographs 13 of the album includes two photographs.; Photograph 1 [276] shows a river lined with moss covered trees.; Photograph 2 shows a canal or estuary along treeless banks [probable canal for rice irrigation].
mods.note: Compare Photograph 2 to the following publication. Stubbs, W.C. (1900) Rice. Louisiana Bulletin, No. 61, p. 386. Photograph is captioned, "Irrigation Canal Viewed From Pumps; Rice Fields to the Left."

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
